introduction_text:
I hereby accept the provisional admission offer for my child/ward.

I acknowledge that:


  1. This admission is provisional and subject to submission of all required documents, payment of school fees, and compliance with MPIS admission policies.
  2. I will submit the outstanding documents and complete all administrative formalities before the stated deadline.
  3. I understand that failure to meet the conditions of this offer may result in withdrawal of the provisional admission.
